main event: A family observed a UFO resembling a submarine without a conning tower flying over trees while driving towards Easton, Pennsylvania in June 1966.
interesting points: The UFO flew slowly and hovered over a field,There were white lights in the front and rear and blinking red lights during the sighting,The sighting was reported shortly after it happened in a letter dated August 10, 1966,The family was unable to stop due to heavy traffic,The witness expressed interest in other UFO sightings and investigations by the Air Force.
sighted object: an object resembling a submarine without a conning tower
